transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes, good evening. Ma'am, I am speaking from IndiaMART Trade Office.
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Mai keh rahi hu sir aapne concern raise kiya hai by lead ke regarding. Already aapko clear tha aur pehle bhi humne aapko paanch by lead diya tha sir.
Customer: Mai madam aapne mail check kiya kya?
Executive: Maine mail check kar liya sir.
Customer: Haan, uske hisab se aap dekh lijiye kya karna hai. Varna mai Monday ko baat karta hu usse.
Executive: Sir aap har baar aise by lead ke liye concern raise karenge to aise nahi ho payega na wo clear wo mai clear kar rahi hu nahi ho payega sir.
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai, dekhta hu phir mai. Mai baat karta hu aapke senior se.
Executive: Nahi close karne to bol hi nahi rahi hu mai.
Customer: Sir to aapko already clear hai na pehle bhi humne paanch by lead diya tha sir. Ab aap aap aapne non-negotiable kar liya.
Executive: Nahi abhi maang nahi raha hu mai. Suniye na meri by lead maang nahi raha hu mai. Mai adjust karne ke liye bol raha hu yearly jo by lead hai.
Customer: Kya keh rahe ho yearly wali?
Customer: Jo yearly by lead aayi hai na usme adjust karne bol raha hu mai.
Executive: Nahi sir nahi ho payega. I am really sorry sir nahi ho payega.
Customer: Aapke paas abhi weekly mere paas padi hai wo by lead mai adjust kar sakte ho?
Executive: Aapke paas jo weekly by lead padi hai wo mai aapko non-negotiable mai adjust kar sakte ho.
Customer: Haan, aapko maang nahi raha hu mai.
Customer: Maine kab use kiya hai aap dekh lo na. Maine kab use kiya hai dekh lo aap. 12 baje ke baad use kiya hai.
Executive: Sir 12 baje ke arey sir wo to 12 baje ke baad agar aap karte to.
Customer: Thik hai mai aapko abhi nahi karta hu kal baat karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to adjust yearly buyleads.

- Customer wants to adjust weekly buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive denied adjusting yearly buyleads.

- Executive denied adjusting weekly buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call the executive tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, adjustment, yearly, weekly
